title: The truth about Tom Brady
itunes:title: The truth about Tom Brady
description:
Colin talks about the Tom Brady's lengthy interview with Howard Stern and why it should make you like him even more. Guests include Jay Glazer, Nick Wright, Michael Holley, and Chris Long.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
